title: BRIEF-Helios And Matheson Analytics-Will Need Proceeds From Stock Sales Following Equity Distribution Agreement With Canaccord Genuity/Other Sources, From May 2018
text:
May 8 (Reuters) - Helios and Matheson Analytics Inc :
* HELIOS AND MATHESON ANALYTICS-WILL NEED PROCEEDS FROM STOCK SALES FOLLOWING EQUITY DISTRIBUTION AGREEMENT WITH CANACCORD GENUITY/OTHER SOURCES, FROM MAY 2018
* HELIOS - AS OF APRIL 30, HAD ABOUT $15.5 MILLION IN AVAILABLE CASH & ABOUT $27.9 MILLION ON DEPOSIT WITH MERCHANT PROCESSORS FOR ABOUT $43.4 MILLION- SEC FILING Source text: [ bit.ly/2K21uFk ] Further company coverage:
